name: Kolibrio
intro: Bringing MEV back to transaction originators via OFAs.
introduce: Kolibrio is a BEV Relay (Broadcaster Extractable Value) that allows transaction broadcasters like node providers, non-custodial wallets, cross-chain bridges and dApps to offer better user experience, enable MEV-cashback, optimize infrastructure and improve the bottom line. It aims to help transaction originators get ownership of the order flow they create and have the option to monetize it via a system of on-chain order flow auctions (OFAs).
